videos.title: Why Most People Stay Broke (Even With a Good Salary)
videos.script:
Most people don’t stay broke because they earn too little.
They stay broke because they never learn how money actually works.

If your income goes up, but your expenses rise even faster, you’re running on a treadmill — not building wealth.

The rich don’t just work for money.
They make money work for them.

They prioritize assets over liabilities.
They invest before they spend.
And they think long-term while everyone else thinks monthly.

Saving alone won’t make you wealthy.
But learning how to invest, manage risk, and control lifestyle inflation will.

You don’t need a million dollars to start.
You need the right habits, the right mindset, and consistency.

The sooner you understand this, the faster your financial life changes.

Follow for more simple money lessons that actually work.
